preqs: ECE2021 or PHS2022 and ECE2041 and ECE2061

rules.ruleString: For COURSE_CODE IN {4688, E6001} Do true Otherwise (Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ECE2021, PHS2022} AND  Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ECE2041} AND  Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ECE2061})
For COURSE_CODE IN {4688, E6001} Do Any co-req (I/W) unit set {MAE-ELEC, MAEELEC01} Otherwise Any co-req (I/W) unit in {ECE3022}

description: This unit is a study of passive and active electronic components and devices and how they perform at radio and microwave frequencies. Physical RF circuits are to be designed, built and tested in the laboratory and as design projects. Extensive use is made of modern RF simulation and design software.
